reviewText: Excellent vdeo, a classic in drumming study
The name saids it all, Mike Portnoy. This is an advance DVD to learn the basis of fusion technikes. Practice with a LOT of patience every day and you will never get frustrated ;D

Nice instructional DVD. It is a bit of an older DVD but still awesome stuff. I plan on getting the other more recent Portnoy DVD's but figured on starting with this one first. Great instruction and decent price.

Mike makes it looks SOOOOOO easy. His ability to improvise on complicated meters is simply amazing. What a drummer.

He breaks things down; then builds it up as his embellishments become more and more complicated.
